subject: Tennis
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: Marat Safin suddenly looked like a dominant force again on Centre Court on Wednesday, bombing big serves as he defeated the third-seeded Novak Djokovic 6-4, 7-6 (3), 6-2.
snippet: Marat Safin suddenly looked like a dominant force again on Centre Court on Wednesday, bombing big serves as he defeated the third-seeded Novak Djokovic 6-4, 7-6 (3), 6-2.
